channel.title: Unable to log in after update
channel.description:
I updated whonix, now when I start up, and I am unable to log in with default log in user and changeme details, and it shows the error
usr/libexec/security-misc/pam-info: line 78 faillock: command not found
any idea on what this could mean and how to fix it?

item.title: Unable to log in after update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Update or release upgrade?

If release upgrade… Easiest… Factory reset re-install method.

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Whonix ™ Factory Reset

Resetting Whonix ™ to Vendor Defaults. Reset configuration files to defaults, re-install meta package, move the system closer to vendor defaults.

Otherwise fixing from recovery mode would be more difficult.

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Recovery

Recovery Mode, Emergency, Chroot, Debugging, Capturing Diagnostic Output from Serial Console

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to log in after update
